name: KASHMIR  PEACE  FORUM
goal:
The goals of Kashmir Peace Forum are to defend the Kashmir Issue at International level such as EU .UNO and other like Organisations.
1.to take steps for accession of the of Jammu and Kashmir to the will of Kashmirs.
2. To protect Human Rights violations by Indian Military Forces in Indian Occupied Jammu and Kashmir.
3.To work as think tank to implement the UNO Resolution 47 passed by UNO Security Council for the right of self determination for the people of Jammu and Kashmirs.
4.to arrange and organise functions/meetings of the Kashmiri Leaders from Jammu and Kashmir struggling for the rights of Kashmiris ,with MEPS and EU Officials in EU and such organisations in the world.
5. To follow-up the steps taken by EU members in the Parliament and through different seminars held in EU Parliament organised by MEPS and some NGOs. from time to time for many previous years.
6.to undertake such other matters against the Human Rights violations in Kashmir and other parts of the world for maintaining peace for humanity.
7.To raise voice against the action of Indian Goverment to send more Armed Forces and to impose Curfew in Occupied Jammu and Kashmir and to finish status of Kashmir.
interests: Culture, Education and training, External Relations, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
a. The main policies of Kashmir Peace Forum are to defend Human Rights violations in Occupied Kashmir and Pelestine and other parts of the world.
b. To organise seminars and meetings in EU Parliament to raise voice against the violation of human rights throughout the world especially in Indian Occupied Kashmir. .

c. To work as think tank for convincing MEPS and EU Officials for the support of Kashmiri people who have struggling for their self determination right since 1947

d. To convince the EU members and Political Groups in Parliament to put the political pressure on India for the implementation of UNO resolution 47 passed by security council for the right of self determination in the occupied Jammu and Kashmir. and to lift curfew in Occupied kashmir imposed since August 2019

e. To follow-up the steps taken by EU members in the Parliament and through different seminars held in EU Parliament organised by MEPS and some NGOs. from time to time for the last many years.
f. To explore rights of education/health for the needy people of the developing world like Pakistan,Bangladesh.
